name: Cordon of Arrows
description: You plant four pieces of nonmagical ammunition in the ground to create a magic trap. Until the spell ends, whenever a creature other than you comes within 30 feet of the ammunition, one piece flies up and makes a ranged spell attack against that creature. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 piercing damage. The ammunition is consumed. At higher levels, you plant two additional pieces per slot level above 2nd.
higherLevels: Plant two additional pieces of ammunition per slot level above 2nd.

components.materialDescription: four or more arrows or bolts

effects.description: One planted ammo piece makes a ranged spell attack; on hit, deals 1d6 piercing and is consumed.
